title: Poster, "El Atomo Para La Paz (Atoms for Peace), General Dynamics", 1956
title_raw: El Atomo Para La Paz, General Dynamics
provenance: May 2, 1999: Arthur M. Cohen and Daryl R. Otte (from Posters International); 2013: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Arthur Cohen and Daryl Otte in memory of Bill Moggridge
description: Poster depicts an oculus of digital blocks of color, growing more concentrated as the blocks get smaller and closer to the center. Above: el atomo para la paz; below: GENERAL DYNAMICS; center right: solar dynamics.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "El Atomo Para La Paz (Atoms for Peace), General Dynamics", 1956. Offset lithograph on paper. Gift of Arthur Cohen and Daryl Otte in memory of Bill Moggridge. 2013-42-1.
